name: Medieval Archer
description:
Travel back in time and take your role as an archer in an medieval era where you will hone your skills with bow and arrow.

Fight the clock and send flurrys of arrows through the air in the Quick shot mode, shoulder the true arts of an marksman as you send your arrows at targets far accross the plains in Accuracy mode, serve and protect the castle from hoards of monsters and bosses in the Defence mode.

Unlockable difficulties
Hidden additional game mode
And more+

Available for Vive, Oculus and Mixed reality
